TopicTitle: Asteroids are ghosts with no mass... Can't grab them !

Articles.Content:
i guess i can't be the first one to notice !

I did the Class C asteroid capture do Eve mission and once i reached the damn thing i went right through it !

It had no substance so i never managed to use the claws on it.

Any idea what "I" would have done wrong ?

Thanks !

Were you still in timewarp?

As said above, if your still in timewarp you go right through the rock. All you need to do is not get into timewarp and you should be able to hug a nice giant rock with mass
